name: Immunity_chinese_ver
description:
This is my Game Jam solo project In CiGA Bomb event. 

Took me about 5 days to make this.
The idea is from Corona Virus,then I came up with the Idea of make game about Biology immune system.
Then I design this one that Virus can breed,balls have positive abilities.
I wanted to add some Rogue-like elements to make this more fun to play,
but there's not enough to make so much gimmicks.
this is just a early playable demo.

Controls:

Keyboard : 

  Left/Right Key to Move

  A S D F Key to use Skill.

XBox Controller

  Left Scroll to move

  X Y A B Buttons to use Skill

Have Fun !!!
